title: Introductory Physics
description: Elementary introduction to mechanics, gases, liquids and solids, heat, vibrations and waves, light, electricity and magnetism. Intended to provide non-science students with an understanding of basic physical concepts. Not open to students who have credit in a college physics course. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE B3.
prerequisites: Passing score on ELM examination, or an ELM exemption, or credit in MATH 104
